hero.title: Laterem Group
description: Laterem Group is a London based organisation that provides world-class investment opportunities across the United Kingdom.
The team were in need of a new brand identity and website to present their past and current projects within their property, investment and development sectors.

projectDetails.title: Brand Identity
projectDetails.description: To identity between Laterem's core sectors, I created 3 logos and colour schemes. Laterem (Latin) translates to 'brick', which was the foundation to their branding.

projectDetails.title: Wireframes
projectDetails.description: I completed user and market research to gain insight on the best solution towards content narration with a good visual flow.

projectDetails.title: Web Design
projectDetails.description: To guide the user through the site fluently, I used simple but effective interactions, whilst using bold imagery to convey Laterem's impressive portfolio.

text: With 3 separate sectors of the company, I created the branding to assist the user to clearly navigate and identify between their property, investment and development industries. Professionalism and reliability are qualities I implemented into each section to reflect the company, qualities potential clients will be looking for in their chosen organisation.
Laterem now has a unique and insightful website to intrigue new and existing clients to enquire about their services.
